statements: DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE city='New York';
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-05-20';
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE weather_condition = 'Rain' OR road_condition = 'Snow';
DELETE FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE location='ABC' AND traffic_volume > 1000;
DELETE FROM Infrastructure WHERE location='XYZ' AND upgrade_cost < 5000.00;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE id = 10 AND date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE importance > 5 AND id IN (SELECT id FROM predicted_traffic WHERE confidence_level < 0.8);
